html: 6.21.17  1:12 am   bill, i think there's a number of us that don't want you to collab with anyone because your strange lonesome uniqueness is why we're here in the first place. thx

6.21.17  1:10 am   Is one motivation for focusing on songs and not videos is that it is possibly less tedious work? I'd imagine there's plenty of hard work for songs, but I know that editing videos is often an annoying process. HOTEWIG demanded a lot of that, are you giving yourself a small break from the research and script writing?

6.21.17  12:28 am   Man, do your songs, get back on track. If you must do videos, do the ones that require as little editing as possible (i suggested before ones with just the song and the name on the screen or the rotating vinyl). Your fans on youtube will be satisfied, the ones who like songs will be as well, and of course you will get to organize your time better. I see it as a win-win situation at the moment. After you get more comfortable, you go back to more elaborate videos and updating the reality stuff etc. So for a while, focus "solely" on songs and like two weeks from now you start to do the "easy" videos so everyone is happy. Just a suggestion. Have a good day.

6.21.17  12:02 am   Older composers, from the era before modern styles of music production, wrote their things, and had other people play them. Have you ever considered selling or otherwise releasing sheets/charts/ anything like that for other people to play and produce, so you would have slightly more time to spend multiple weeks on producing single songs, or working on videos, etc. ?
6.21.17  12:01 am   how does it feel to feel because if you don't feel how do you feel?

In a later video, "still a piece of garbage", you mentioned that you were "still a piece of garbage." did you ever find a way to stop being a piece of garbage? if not do you have any advice about coping with being a piece of garbage?

6.20.17  9:53 pm   How many songs do you think you're gonna do before going back to videos or something else like the reality vids?

6.20.17  9:30 pm   Where do you get the impression that "microtonality is usually associated with an artificially constructed 24 tone chromatic scale"... I thought microtonality just meant dividing the traditional 12-tone chromatic scale into more than 12 tones.. Can't you divide an octave into 13 evenly spaced intervals, or into 999999999 ka-zillion equally spaced intervals and have that be considered microtonal? I've never heard of microtonality as strictly referring to dividing the the 12 semitones in half... Just curious.
6.20.17  9:28 pm   How did urbster1 on Instagram know the lyrics to your new song before it was released?

6.20.17  8:39 pm   Hey Bill! Its the guy who send you a question about the next song. Thanks for reminding me! Listen though, I think you should start making more videos. I think your videos are a masterpiece. And I have been thinking... if you want to make new songs, you can use songs like, notbugs, and hide the money. You can even make more monday videos, including music videos like murder your demon and even blue boy, because I really want to see that. And I hope you do more of those reality stuff you posted, like the reality video where you said you posted the japan video. I am still waiting to see what is next for your future. Thank you, and have a FANTASTIC day!
